title: nuttx/arm: Fix build warning with -Walloc-size-larger-than.
body:
nuttx/include/libcxx/new:270:24: warning: argument 1 value '18446744073709551599' exceeds maximum object size 9223372036854775807 [-Walloc-size-larger-than=]
  270 |   return ::operator new(__args...);
      |          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~

## Summary

fix warning

## Impact

cxx

## Testing

ci test
author: cuiziweizw

title: nuttx/arm: Fix build warning with -Walloc-size-larger-than.

title: iss-hifi: fix header guard issue
body: fix header guard to avoid mixed include header file
author: chirping78

comments.body: The format issue reported by CI can't be resoved, since the header is from vendor.
@pengxianghao21 the style check make the false alarm, how to bypass it?

> @pengxianghao21 the style check make the false alarm, how to bypass it?

should we pass all coding style in `tie-asm.h` within xtensa later in all?

if so, `tie-asm.h` we may add it the coding check white list, then trigger CI later.cc @zhangning21
